Enron:
Are you sure? I am very grateful. You will need to slay all types of alligators on Alligator Island. Slay the Alligator, Crokian Lad, Dailaon Lad, Crokian Lad Warrior, Farhite Lad, Nos Lad, Swamp Tribe, Swamp Alligator and Swamp Warrior, and collect 150 Alligator Leathers.
After collecting them all, you won't need to return to me. Head to Head Blacksmith Flutter in the Town of Oren.
